report.title: Group counts using standard parameters
report.description: Gives the count of species groups recorded at an event. Uses the external key to map across multiple checklists back to a single master list.
report.query: (SELECT cttl.taxon_group, count(o.*) as count FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.external_key=o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key and cttl.taxon_list_id=#master_taxon_list_id# and cttl.preferred=true #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# GROUP BY cttl.taxon_group ORDER BY count(o.*) DESC LIMIT #top_n_groups_to_include#) UNION SELECT 'Others', sum(count) FROM ( SELECT cttl.taxon_group, count(o.*) FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.external_key=o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key and cttl.taxon_list_id=#master_taxon_list_id# and cttl.preferred=true #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# GROUP BY cttl.taxon_group ORDER BY count(o.*) DESC OFFSET #top_n_groups_to_include# ) as sub ORDER BY taxon_group

param.name: master_taxon_list_id
param.description: ID of the list to map all species back to when obtaining the preferred species details
